intrusive_inspection_example: Internal inspection via pigging and in-line inspection technology (MFL, magnetic flux leakage (MFL), internal rotary UT, etc.)
100 % external vent that is only partially buried using an NDE crawler with circumferential inspection technology (MFL, lamb-wave UT)
Complete excavation, 100 % external VT, and 100 % inspection with NDE technologies
Sample soil and water resistivity and chemistry measurements along entire structure
nonintrusive_inspection_example: CP system maintained and managed by NACE certified personnel and complying with NACE SP0169
Includes stray current surveys on a regular basis
Soil and water chemistry should be measured at properly determined intervals

intrusive_inspection_example: Internal inspection via pigging and in-line inspection technology (MFL, lamb-wave UT, or MFL, internal rotary UT, etc.) of selected areas/sections, combined with statistical analysis or EVA
Close interval survey performance of the CP system locally and utilized to select the excavation sites (based on the findings)
Inspection of 100 % 'selected' locations, 100 % external visual, and 100 % inspection with NDE technologies
nonintrusive_inspection_example: External inspection of equipment that is only partially buried using an NDE crawler with circumferential inspection technology (MFL, lamb-wave UT) on selected areas/sections, combined with statistical analysis or EVA
CP system maintained and managed by NACE certified personnel and complying with NACE SP0169
Includes stray current surveys on a regular basis
Soil and water chemistry should be measured at properly determined intervals
Direct current voltage gradient (DCVG) to determine coating damage

intrusive_inspection_example: Partial inspection by internal smart pig or specialized crawler inspection on a representative portion of the buried pipe (< 25 %)
nonintrusive_inspection_example: Partial excavation guided-wave UT global search inspection in one direction of pipe. Corrosion inspection and maintenance managed by NACE certified and CP specialist, or equivalent.
Spot check with conventional NDE technologies of equipment of local areas exposed by excavation
